00036 #ifndef ABSTRACTCELLPROPERTY_HPP_
00037 #define ABSTRACTCELLPROPERTY_HPP_
00038 
00039 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00040 #include "ChasteSerialization.hpp"
00041 #include "Identifiable.hpp"
00042 
00049 class AbstractCellProperty : public Identifiable
00050 {
00051 private:
00052 
00056     unsigned mCellCount;
00057 
00059     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00066     template<class Archive>
00067     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00068     {
00069         archive & mCellCount;
00070     }
00071 
00072 public:
00076     AbstractCellProperty();
00077 
00081     virtual ~AbstractCellProperty();
00082 
00094     template<class CLASS>
00095     bool IsType() const
00096     {
00097         CLASS ref_obj;
00098         return IsSame(&ref_obj);
00099     }
00100 
00108     template<class BASECLASS>
00109     bool IsSubType() const
00110     {
00111         // We put a const_cast in here so users don't have to worry about whether the
00112         // property object they are testing is const or not.
00113         BASECLASS* p_subclass = dynamic_cast<BASECLASS*>(const_cast<AbstractCellProperty*>(this));
00114         return (p_subclass != NULL);
00115     }
00116 
00121     bool IsSame(const AbstractCellProperty* pOther) const;
00122 
00127     bool IsSame(boost::shared_ptr<const AbstractCellProperty> pOther) const;
00128 
00132     void IncrementCellCount();
00133 
00137     void DecrementCellCount();
00138 
00142     unsigned GetCellCount() const;
00143 };
00144 
00145 #endif /* ABSTRACTCELLPROPERTY_HPP_ */
